help_main:
You can get your access code from your team leader or Salvation Army Staff  to use the app
Please fill in your name and email address in case we need verification on the records that you input
Click on the gear icon to switch between English and Cantonese
help_newrecord:
To start a new record (encountering a new person to assess), please press the “New Record” button
If there is no more data to be inputted, please press the “Finish Outreach” button
Remarks: Once you press “Finish Outreach” button, you cannot add more entry!
help_patientinfo:
Please fill in the personal info you got from the person you have approached through conversation.

Remarks:
Location: Please type the location or closest landmark of the person.
Name:  Record the name that they introduced themself with
Description: Can be location “man living under a bridge” or based on their physical trait “woman wearing a blue cap” “pregnant woman” 
This will help later volunteers to approach the right person if he/she needs a follow up.
CSSA (Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) Scheme)
Entering their date of birth will automatically calculate their age.
Tick the reject button if the person does not want your help or  their health to be checked

Record the values of the ones you checked (based on the medical equipment available on the outreach)
Write additional notes if the person shows any worrying values or health problems that should be checked again or thoroughly

Type if there are any problems in the person’s physical and mental conditions through observation and conversation.
Do take a photo by pressing the camera button and directly attach their consent form (paper) in the ‘Additional files or photos’ section.’ 
You can add photos of the person’s physical ailments or previous medical appointments/referrals in the ‘Additional files or photos’ section.
Clicking “Finish record” will take you to the next page where you can upload your records to the Salvation Army database
help_files:
This page contains a list of the patient records that are temporarily stored on your phone and not yet uploaded to the Salvation Army database
Please upload the files as soon as you're done typing them by pressing 'upload'.
In the case that your phone is not connected to the internet, your files will not upload, they will be stored in your phone.
Please be sure to upload them as soon as your phone is connected to the internet.
thank_you_for_contribution: Thank you for your contribution! By filling out these forms, you help us save time and effort in organizing our records. We hope to see you again soon!
